      • getWinMessage

        private int getWinMessage(GameResult result)
                   throws IllegalArgumentException
        Simple switch to announce winner
        Parameters:
        winner - player who won
        Returns:
        0 if a draw, 1 if player won, -1 if cpu won
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException
